title: IMPROVE Exercises
introText: Take your time with these calming exercises to build emotional awareness and expand your ability to identify and name feelings with kindness toward yourself.

exercises.title: Identify Triggers
exercises.description: Think of recent situation where you felt overwhelmed. How might you use each part of IMPROVE to manage it? Write down specific strategies for each letter.

exercises.title: Practice Each Tool
exercises.description: Spend a day focusing on one letter of IMPROVE and reflect on how it helped. Build familiarity with each technique before crisis moments.

exercises.title: Create a Personalized Toolkit
exercises.description: Which parts of IMPROVE resonate most with you? Write them down and keep the list handy for moments of distress. Customize for your preferences.

exercises.title: Be Patient With Yourself
exercises.description: The more you patiently practice identifying emotions, the better you'll become at understanding and managing them with compassion.
